pkgmetadata.longdescription: # CloudBlue Connect Python SDKThis is a Python 3 SDK for [CloudBlue Connect](https://www.cloudblue.com/connect/) platform, autogenerated from the Haxe source code available [here](https://github.com/cloudblue/connect-haxe-sdk).Documentation is available [here](https://cloudblue.github.io/connect-haxe-sdk/).> NOTE: This package is in development stage, please use the> [connect-sdk](https://pypi.org/project/connect-sdk/) package instead.
